Articles.Content:
We do not negotiate with terrorists. Killing those hostages will merely further cement public opinion against your dastardly cause.

 Come out now, and we \*might\* be lenient. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

-Slashy
Annnnd no, not with that in your blog.
